Name: [Duel] Bench
Desc: When an enemy is Stunned, Agents gain <color=#2BAD00>15%</color> Decibels, and all squad members gain <color=#2BAD00>2</color> stacks of Rush. Can trigger once every <color=#2BAD00>10</color>s.
Desc2:
"I can't bear to watch. I want in, too!"
And then they strike with the power of a substitution that catches enemies off guard.
